story:
HELLO | thank you for taking the time to read on. 


OUR WISH | to get A RECORD pressed, printed and into the world by Dec 2015. 


PRE-PURCHASE | we are asking for you to pre-purchase A RECORD.


INVESTMENT | your investment will enable the printing and production of A RECORD.


THANK YOU | we are relying on your trust to make it so.


WHO ARE WE 

JUDITH WILLIAMS | I am an artist working as a singer, actress and theatre maker. I was prompted to record a jazz album after having been shortlisted as Best Jazz Vocalist Scotland 2013. I'm putting music in the heart of my art! It's been said I'm a "unique lady songstress", a "gloriously multifarious" performer with a voice that has "the power to endure ready tears". Nigel and I worked together 7 years ago on a theatre piece and said then to get in touch when I was ready to sing jazz - so I did! 

NIGEL CLARK | Nigel has worked with some of the biggest names in jazz and popular music. Recent recordings include his solo album Under The Stars (Circular Records) and Day Of The Duo a guitar duets album with Irish jazz guitarist Hugh Buckley. “Clark’s jazz improvisations … are in our opinion representative of the highest possible level in creative virtuosity” – Contemporary Music Network.



WHAT WE'VE CREATED 

 A RECORD | of time, of love, of loneliness, of longing, of jazz. 

We’ve carefully carved this album of classic jazz tunes and hope we have honored the warmth, beauty and truth that a classic collection can bring. It’s a very simple, unedited offering. Deliberately minimal, intimately recorded live over two days in Stuart’s beautiful studio; our host, engineer and mastering mastermind.

For me, Jude, they are late night lullabies, songs that I have loved and learnt from and through with a guitarist that I have long admired and trusted in his musical integrity. 

[Jude | I live in Glasgow and Nigel now lives in Dublin hence my singing alone under a bridge! For copy right and licensing reasons we can't the actual RECORD with you  unless on CD or vinyl!]

Click this link here to hear snippets of our RECORD http://www.judithwilliams.me/music/

THE OFFERING | A RECORD in 2 recorded formats and one exclusive concert

Our plan is to release A RECORD in two recorded formats. Meaning you can [pre] purchase it in either vinyl or CD.

We’ll then post it to you, in December from Glasgow to anywhere in the UK, Europe or elsewhere in the world.


LP | 12' Vinyl

A classic format, the perfect accompaniment to any 12’ player, whether old or new. Our LP comes in a lovely sleeve, with inner cover to keep the record as pristine as possible.

CD | Album

Less traditional perhaps but the same quality, enjoy exactly the same tunes as the LP in a slightly newer format. Minimal paper cover, maximum joy. 

BULK PURCHASE | If you would like to bulk buy CD's and or Vinyl, then please email me direct at: judith.jude@gmail.com


LIVE | Exclusive House Concert

We will also bring 20-signed copies of the album in your chosen format[s] with us as a memento of your evening. A special, intimate evening with friends and family: a private concert experience.

* Nigel and Jude will be available on Sunday 6th December to perform in your home somewhere in Central Scotland.


FUNDRAISING | Why Indiegogo? 

We are asking for you to buy A RECORD in advance to allow for the records to be printed. 

We recorded the album in March this year and discovered that printing records is an expensive business. Finding the cash to front the cost for pressing, printing and distribution is tricky to say the least. We've done some maths and we're hoping to get around that hurdle with your upfront investment. 


PRODUCTION | What's Being Funded? 

By purchasing a copy of the record, your money will directly be funding:

•  Production of the record and CD

•  Design of our Album and artwork *

•  Production licenses that allow us to use the tracks

•  Promotion of the album

Any additional funds will help with the tour in 2016. With the album made and self-released by the end of 2015, we hope to tour it in 2016. 

* Massive appreciation to the time and talents of Jannica Honey [photograpy], Orlando Lloyd [design] and Ian Bustard [for filming me under a bridge!].


WHAT HAPPENS NEXT | if you invest then we can press! [and press on]

We're ready to put A RECORD into the world and we'd be delighted if you can help us make that happen. Truly truly! 

To launch the record, we plan to have two gigs this December in Glasgow and Edinburgh. Please do come!

After that, with the album out in the world, we hope to embark on a tour in 2016 to share the work with as many people as possible.

Thank you for your time and trust. 

Warmest wishes 

Jude and Nigel

xx

story:
Short Summary

      My name is Rheva Henry, and I am a Texas native that was called to the desert of Phoenix, AZ back in 2011. This four and a half year journey has been full of difficult times and joyous victories. I know God brought me to Phoenix to discover who I really am, and it has been an awarding journey over all. I have had to be broken over and over again, because of the weight of the assignment on my life. It is not something that I take lightly, nor something that I feel completely ready for, but I know it's time. This assignment extends beyond music, but this is where we are starting.

       By contributing to this project, I really feel that together we are planting seeds for people to draw to Him in the midst of their brokenness, and the harvest will be thousands of people engaged in an intimate relationship with God that will captivate them for the rest of their lives. I don't think you can really put a price on that, but it will be beautiful to see many people fall more in love with Jesus and experience true God encounters because of this project.


What We Need & What You Get

The project will consist of 4 original songs, and 2 covers of songs that have been very instrumental to me on this journey. We are raising $15,000 to cover the following:

  • 2 - producers
  • 5 - musicians
  • 6 - singers
  • Mixing
  • Mastering
  • CD Duplication
  • Marketing
  • Licenses/Copyright/Publishing
  • Videographer
  • Photographer
  • Flights (for out of town peeps)
  • Hospitality (food, housing, etc. for recording week)
  • Equipment incidentals
We are offering these perks for the following giving levels to show our appreciation!!
  • $1000+ = an opportunity to be a part of the recording night; dinner with the team that evening; a signed physical copy of the completed project.
  • $500+ = Signed physical copy of the completed project; personal thank you call.
  • $100+ = Personal thank you card
  • $50+ = Personal video message via social media
  • $25+ = Social Media shout-out
What happens if we don't reach our goal?
We will scale back some of the items for the project with efforts to still make it an excellent project.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Prayer!! Pray that this project is everything that God wants it to be. Pray for our team that God does something in each of us throughout this process, and we that we truly minister out of our own broken places.
  • Please let people that you may know that I don't know about this, in hopes that they may support!
  • And as always, use the sharing tools here to share with your peeps via social media or email!!

story:
BEM VINDO À CAMPANHA DO MEU 2o ALBUM!
 < WELCOME TO THE CROWDFUNDING FOR MY 2nd ALBUM! >
                                                                                                               (ENGLISH after)

Olá Família e Amig@s!

Saúdo cada um com carinhoe o coração preenchido de novas melodias para partilhar com Todos e lançar ao Mundo!

E trago-vos uma boa notícia!

Vive em mim uma grande vontade de fazer nascer o meu segundo álbum de músicas originais com tonalidades e cores portuguesas. Este surge como um registo da energia que emergiu da minha viagem à Selva Amazónica em Janeiro de 2015 e os meses que se seguiram em Portugal. 

Apelo a Todos os que sentirem fazer deste projecto um pouco seu. Ao apoiar esta campanha estarão a participar activamente na concretização deste novo álbum, e assim tornar, este meu sonho, uma realidade para todos.

∞

PROJECTO

Ao dar continuidade à linha do primeiro álbum “SOLay” que, em Quechua - a língua ancestral da cordilheira dos Andes -, significa Semear, a semente cria raiz. Nutrida da intenção de conhecer o que está mais profundo e de chegar ao coração do mundo, o nome deste próximo álbum será Coraçāo emRaiz.

Dando voz ao espírito da terra que me viu nascer, e à cultura das minhas raízes, neste disco cantarei em Português e na língua que o meu próprio coração inventa.

∞

A primeira fase de captação sonora já está a decorrer no Sul de Portugal, no cimo da montanha da Serra da Breijeira, no Estúdio Nazca Music, onde se vive de energias renováveis, o que torna este disco mais Eco!

∞

A próxima fase, juntará músicos portugueses que me inspiram e que complementam as minhas composições. 

∞

Assim como o primeiro álbum, o Coraçāo emRaíz contará com um pequeno livro* das letras e desenhos da minha autoria, desta vez inspirados nas formas tradicionais portuguesas que ganharāo vida com a magia de Marta Valente. 

*Nos agradecimentos do livro, constará os nomes de todos aqueles que apoiarem o projecto, caso nāo haja objecçāo. 

∞

Data prevista para finalizar e enviar o disco: Abril de 2016 

Aqui é onde estou a gravar !!!! < Here is where I'm recording !!!! >

VISÃO

Dar o meu contributo ao mundo, partilhando os sons e os poemas que me habitam e que reforçam a música positiva e regeneradora que está a florescer.

Registar esta inspiração lusitana que traz novos sons à música portuguesa, e fortalecer a ligação que sinto com ela. 

Dar a conhecer o espirito desta terra, tal qual a sinto, às pessoas que, em Portugal e pelo mundo fora, se cruzarem com este trabalho.

∞

ORÇAMENTO

Estes sāo os gastos que prevejo ter para a concretização deste projecto:

§ Captação & Edição 2400 €

§ Masterização 600 €

§ Músicos 500 €

§ Design 1000 €

§ Impressão de 1500 Álbuns 2000 €

§ Produção e despesas adicionais 1500 €

TOTAL: 8000 €  

∞

COMO APOIAR

§ Comprar o álbum “Coraçāo emRaiz” em avanço. Dependendo da quantia doada, haverá uma recompensa respectiva (PERK) a escolher na coluna do lado direito!

§ Divulgar nas Redes Sociais, E-mail, “boca-a-boca” com amig@s e família para conseguir mais apoios!

§ Usar as ferramentas do Indiegogo para espalhar a notícia!

§ Acreditar no projecto e mandar os melhores desejos!


Colecçāo de autocolantes/Stickers collection -- Album SOLay

Uma das recompensas é a colecção de autocolantes do "Coraçāo emRaiz"!!! 

< One of the perks is the stickers collection of the new Album!!! >


∞

SOBRE MIM

Nasci no Porto, Portugal, e desde pequena, mesmo antes de falar, que debitava o meu próprio idioma com sons inventados. 

A música sempre cresceu em mim intuitivamente, acompanhando as minhas escolhas e aprendizagens. No início por imitação e depois criando uma dança própria, ela foi ganhando forma e tornou-se a minha grande companheira.

Fui bebendo de algumas fontes: estudei percussão árabe; canto carnático na Índia; aprendi cantos tradicionais de várias partes do mundo; fiz a Universidade de Música em canto Jazz e descobri a música de intervenção em Portugal. Paralelamente, cultivei livremente o experimentar de novos sons e possibilidades, novas texturas e… a minha voz.

Hoje, as melodias que me habitam, vivem de um profundo e consciente amor pela Natureza e pela existência que me traz criações que tocam o coração das pessoas. Adoro viajar e sentir o bonito de cada “canto” do mundo, deixando-me inspirar por essas culturas e suas expressões. 

Semeei pela primeira vez no mundo com o meu Álbum “SOLay”, financiado por uma campanha crowdfunding que contou com a contribuição de mais de 100 pessoas. Criado no Peru e lançado em Outubro de 2014, abriu caminho para continuar a partilhar o que de melhor tenho para dar.

Aqui é possível ouvir o primeiro Álbum “SOLay”: www.marianaroot.bandcamp.com

Para seguirem o meu Caminho:

www.facebook.com/marianarootmusic

Se houver alguma questāo ou comentário escreve para:

marianarootmusic@gmail.com

VIVA a fonte de inspiração!!!

AGRADEÇO a Todos que se envolvem, apoiam e vibram!!!

AGRADEÇO a atenção, tempo, energia, confiança e carinho!!!

DESEJO que todos possamos realizar os nossos sonhos!!!

<3 ∞ <3

Mariana

A terra onde nasci!!! The land where I was born!!!

<ENGLISH>

Hello Family and Friends!

I greet each one of you warmly and with a heart filled with new melodies to share and launch into the World.

I bring you good news!

Within me lives a great desire of bringing to life my second album of original songs with portuguese colors and shades. It arises as a record of my trip to the Amazon Jungle and the following months in Portugal.

Here is a call to all of you who feel like taking a part on this project. By supporting this campaign you will be actively participating in the realization of this new album, therefore turning my dream into a common reality.

∞

PROJECT

Following the same line of the first album "SOlay", that in Quechua- the ancestral language of the Andes - means “to sow”, now the seed grows into a root (in Portuguese root means raiz). Nurtured with this intention of digging deeper to reach the core, the heart (coração) of the world, the name of this next album comes to be “Coração emRaiz”.

Giving voice to the spirit of the land that gave me birth, and the culture of my roots, this album shall be sung in Portuguese, along with the language that my own heart creates.

∞

The first stage of sound recording is already taking place in the south of Portugal, on top of Serra da Breijeira, in the Nazca Music Studio. This studio lives on sustainable energies, making this new album more Eco!

∞

Next stage will bring together portuguese musicians that inspire me and add expression to my compositions.

∞

As in the previous album, Coração emRaiz will also count on a booklet* containing lyrics and drawings inspired by the traditional portuguese shapes, brought to life by the magic of Marta Valente. 

*This booklet will contain the names of those who support the project, if there is no expressed objection.

Estimated date to finish and send the Album: April 2016

VISION

To give my contribution to the world by sharing the sounds and poems which inhabit me. To give strength to the regenerative and positive music that is flowering.

To register this lusitanian inspiration that brings new sounds to portuguese music and strengthens the connection I feel with it.

To let the spirit of this land be known, just as I feel it, to all the people that cross paths with this work, both in Portugal and throughout the world.

∞

BUDGET

These are the expected expenses in the realization of the project:

§ Recording & Editing 2400 €

§ Mastering 600 €

§ Musicians 500 €

§ Design 1000 €

§ Printing 2000 €

§ Production and additional expenses 1500 €

TOTAL: 8000 €

∞

HOW TO SUPPORT

§ Buy the album “Coraçāo emRaiz” in advance. According to the amount of the donation there will be a reward (PERK)!

§ Share in social networks, E-mail, “word of mouth”, with friends and family to obtain more supports!

§ Use the tools of Indiegogo to spread the news!

§ Believe in the project and send the best wishes!

∞



ABOUT ME

I was born in Porto, Portugal and since I was little I would speak my own language with made up sounds.

Music always grew in me intuitively, going along with my choices and learning process. In the beginning by mimicking, later on creating its own dance, music gained shape and became my great companion. 

I studied Arabic percussion; Carnatic chanting in India; I learned traditional chanting from many parts of the world; I went to music University where I studied jazz singing; and I found intervention music from Portugal. Simultaneously, I cultivated freely the experimentation of new sounds and possibilities, new textures and…my own voice.

Nowadays, the melodies that inhabit me, live of a profound and conscious love for Nature and for existence, which brings to me creations that touch people’s hearts. I love to travel and appreciate the beauty of each “chant” of the world, letting myself be inspired by that culture and expression.

My first "seed" in the world was the album 'SOLay', financed by a crowdfunding campaign which counted with the contribution of more than a hundred people. Created in Peru and launched in October of 2014, it opened the way so I can continue to share the best I have to give.

Here is possible to listen to the first album “SOLay”: www.marianaroot.bandcamp.com

To follow my Path:

www.facebook.com/marianarootmusic

If there is any question or comment write me to:

marianarootmusic@gmail.com

∞

LONG LIVE the source of inspiration!!! 

I GIVE THANKS to all of you who get involved, support and vibrate!!!!

I GIVE THANKS to the attention, time, energy, trust and love!!!

I WISH that we all fulfill our dreams

<3 ∞ <3

Mariana
story_txt:
BEM VINDO À CAMPANHA DO MEU 2o ALBUM! < WELCOME TO THE CROWDFUNDING FOR MY 2nd ALBUM! >                                                                                                               (ENGLISH after)



Olá Família e Amig@s!
Saúdo cada um com carinhoe o coração preenchido de novas melodias para partilhar com Todos e lançar ao Mundo!
E trago-vos uma boa notícia!
Vive em mim uma grande vontade de fazer nascer o meu segundo álbum de músicas originais com tonalidades e cores portuguesas. Este surge como um registo da energia que emergiu da minha viagem à Selva Amazónica em Janeiro de 2015 e os meses que se seguiram em Portugal. 
Apelo a Todos os que sentirem fazer deste projecto um pouco seu. Ao apoiar esta campanha estarão a participar activamente na concretização deste novo álbum, e assim tornar, este meu sonho, uma realidade para todos.

∞
PROJECTO

Ao dar continuidade à linha do primeiro álbum “SOLay” que, em Quechua - a língua ancestral da cordilheira dos Andes -, significa Semear, a semente cria raiz. Nutrida da intenção de conhecer o que está mais profundo e de chegar ao coração do mundo, o nome deste próximo álbum será Coraçāo emRaiz.
Dando voz ao espírito da terra que me viu nascer, e à cultura das minhas raízes, neste disco cantarei em Português e na língua que o meu próprio coração inventa.
∞
A primeira fase de captação sonora já está a decorrer no Sul de Portugal, no cimo da montanha da Serra da Breijeira, no Estúdio Nazca Music, onde se vive de energias renováveis, o que torna este disco mais Eco!
∞
A próxima fase, juntará músicos portugueses que me inspiram e que complementam as minhas composições. 
∞
Assim como o primeiro álbum, o Coraçāo emRaíz contará com um pequeno livro* das letras e desenhos da minha autoria, desta vez inspirados nas formas tradicionais portuguesas que ganharāo vida com a magia de Marta Valente. 
*Nos agradecimentos do livro, constará os nomes de todos aqueles que apoiarem o projecto, caso nāo haja objecçāo. 

∞
Data prevista para finalizar e enviar o disco: Abril de 2016 



Aqui é onde estou a gravar !!!! < Here is where I'm recording !!!! >

VISÃO
Dar o meu contributo ao mundo, partilhando os sons e os poemas que me habitam e que reforçam a música positiva e regeneradora que está a florescer.
Registar esta inspiração lusitana que traz novos sons à música portuguesa, e fortalecer a ligação que sinto com ela. 
Dar a conhecer o espirito desta terra, tal qual a sinto, às pessoas que, em Portugal e pelo mundo fora, se cruzarem com este trabalho.
∞
ORÇAMENTO
Estes sāo os gastos que prevejo ter para a concretização deste projecto:
§ Captação & Edição 2400 €
§ Masterização 600 €
§ Músicos 500 €
§ Design 1000 €
§ Impressão de 1500 Álbuns 2000 €
§ Produção e despesas adicionais 1500 €
TOTAL: 8000 €  
∞
COMO APOIAR
§ Comprar o álbum “Coraçāo emRaiz” em avanço. Dependendo da quantia doada, haverá uma recompensa respectiva (PERK) a escolher na coluna do lado direito!
§ Divulgar nas Redes Sociais, E-mail, “boca-a-boca” com amig@s e família para conseguir mais apoios!
§ Usar as ferramentas do Indiegogo para espalhar a notícia!
§ Acreditar no projecto e mandar os melhores desejos!






Colecçāo de autocolantes/Stickers collection -- Album SOLay
Uma das recompensas é a colecção de autocolantes do "Coraçāo emRaiz"!!! 
< One of the perks is the stickers collection of the new Album!!! >


∞
SOBRE MIM
Nasci no Porto, Portugal, e desde pequena, mesmo antes de falar, que debitava o meu próprio idioma com sons inventados. 
A música sempre cresceu em mim intuitivamente, acompanhando as minhas escolhas e aprendizagens. No início por imitação e depois criando uma dança própria, ela foi ganhando forma e tornou-se a minha grande companheira.
Fui bebendo de algumas fontes: estudei percussão árabe; canto carnático na Índia; aprendi cantos tradicionais de várias partes do mundo; fiz a Universidade de Música em canto Jazz e descobri a música de intervenção em Portugal. Paralelamente, cultivei livremente o experimentar de novos sons e possibilidades, novas texturas e… a minha voz.
Hoje, as melodias que me habitam, vivem de um profundo e consciente amor pela Natureza e pela existência que me traz criações que tocam o coração das pessoas. Adoro viajar e sentir o bonito de cada “canto” do mundo, deixando-me inspirar por essas culturas e suas expressões. 
Semeei pela primeira vez no mundo com o meu Álbum “SOLay”, financiado por uma campanha crowdfunding que contou com a contribuição de mais de 100 pessoas. Criado no Peru e lançado em Outubro de 2014, abriu caminho para continuar a partilhar o que de melhor tenho para dar.
Aqui é possível ouvir o primeiro Álbum “SOLay”: www.marianaroot.bandcamp.com
Para seguirem o meu Caminho:
www.facebook.com/marianarootmusic
Se houver alguma questāo ou comentário escreve para:
marianarootmusic@gmail.com
VIVA a fonte de inspiração!!!
AGRADEÇO a Todos que se envolvem, apoiam e vibram!!!
AGRADEÇO a atenção, tempo, energia, confiança e carinho!!!
DESEJO que todos possamos realizar os nossos sonhos!!!
<3 ∞ <3
Mariana


A terra onde nasci!!! The land where I was born!!!


<ENGLISH>

Hello Family and Friends!
I greet each one of you warmly and with a heart filled with new melodies to share and launch into the World.
I bring you good news!
Within me lives a great desire of bringing to life my second album of original songs with portuguese colors and shades. It arises as a record of my trip to the Amazon Jungle and the following months in Portugal.
Here is a call to all of you who feel like taking a part on this project. By supporting this campaign you will be actively participating in the realization of this new album, therefore turning my dream into a common reality.
∞
PROJECT
Following the same line of the first album "SOlay", that in Quechua- the ancestral language of the Andes - means “to sow”, now the seed grows into a root (in Portuguese root means raiz). Nurtured with this intention of digging deeper to reach the core, the heart (coração) of the world, the name of this next album comes to be “Coração emRaiz”.
Giving voice to the spirit of the land that gave me birth, and the culture of my roots, this album shall be sung in Portuguese, along with the language that my own heart creates.
∞
The first stage of sound recording is already taking place in the south of Portugal, on top of Serra da Breijeira, in the Nazca Music Studio. This studio lives on sustainable energies, making this new album more Eco!
∞
Next stage will bring together portuguese musicians that inspire me and add expression to my compositions.
∞
As in the previous album, Coração emRaiz will also count on a booklet* containing lyrics and drawings inspired by the traditional portuguese shapes, brought to life by the magic of Marta Valente. 
*This booklet will contain the names of those who support the project, if there is no expressed objection.
Estimated date to finish and send the Album: April 2016
VISION
To give my contribution to the world by sharing the sounds and poems which inhabit me. To give strength to the regenerative and positive music that is flowering.
To register this lusitanian inspiration that brings new sounds to portuguese music and strengthens the connection I feel with it.
To let the spirit of this land be known, just as I feel it, to all the people that cross paths with this work, both in Portugal and throughout the world.
∞
BUDGET
These are the expected expenses in the realization of the project:
§ Recording & Editing 2400 €
§ Mastering 600 €
§ Musicians 500 €
§ Design 1000 €
§ Printing 2000 €
§ Production and additional expenses 1500 €
TOTAL: 8000 €
∞
HOW TO SUPPORT
§ Buy the album “Coraçāo emRaiz” in advance. According to the amount of the donation there will be a reward (PERK)!
§ Share in social networks, E-mail, “word of mouth”, with friends and family to obtain more supports!
§ Use the tools of Indiegogo to spread the news!
§ Believe in the project and send the best wishes!
∞






ABOUT ME
I was born in Porto, Portugal and since I was little I would speak my own language with made up sounds.
Music always grew in me intuitively, going along with my choices and learning process. In the beginning by mimicking, later on creating its own dance, music gained shape and became my great companion. 
I studied Arabic percussion; Carnatic chanting in India; I learned traditional chanting from many parts of the world; I went to music University where I studied jazz singing; and I found intervention music from Portugal. Simultaneously, I cultivated freely the experimentation of new sounds and possibilities, new textures and…my own voice.
Nowadays, the melodies that inhabit me, live of a profound and conscious love for Nature and for existence, which brings to me creations that touch people’s hearts. I love to travel and appreciate the beauty of each “chant” of the world, letting myself be inspired by that culture and expression.
My first "seed" in the world was the album 'SOLay', financed by a crowdfunding campaign which counted with the contribution of more than a hundred people. Created in Peru and launched in October of 2014, it opened the way so I can continue to share the best I have to give.
Here is possible to listen to the first album “SOLay”: www.marianaroot.bandcamp.com
To follow my Path:
www.facebook.com/marianarootmusic
If there is any question or comment write me to:
marianarootmusic@gmail.com
∞
LONG LIVE the source of inspiration!!! 
I GIVE THANKS to all of you who get involved, support and vibrate!!!!
I GIVE THANKS to the attention, time, energy, trust and love!!!
I WISH that we all fulfill our dreams
<3 ∞ <3
Mariana

story:
LITTLE SECRET IS...

... the name of my upcoming fifth studio album. #alarkeslittlesecret

It's an exciting, vibey, future-forward electro pop album with elements of experimental, jazz, world, and classical music.

 

 

ABOUT ME

Hi, I'm Alarke, also known as Mary Alouette. I'm a singer, songwriter, music producer, and music coach based in New York City. 

Join me in creating and releasing my fifth album, Little Secret.

I’ve been a professional performing and recording artist for 26 years and a teaching artist for 13 years. It’s my passion. 

As a former opera singer, Gypsy jazz singer, audio engineer, electronic pop vocalist, songwriter, and music producer, this music is about transformation. Evolution. Becoming. 

My musical journey has connected me with others around the world. I've written songs with residents at a refugee camp in Greece, written and recorded Cuban jazz and hip hop collaborations with Cuban and American artists in Cuba, sang Gypsy jazz in Romani caravans in France, performed opera in a castle in Italy, produced records for other artists, and collaborated in award-winning electronic and pop music projects.

You can learn more about my music at www.alarke.com and my music coaching services at setyourlifetomusic.com.

MUSIC DEMOS FOR THE ALBUMS

LITTLE SECRET DEMOS

Little Secret

Shoulda Never Letcha

Real Down

Always

 

CUBA DIARIES DEMOS

Morning

Si Tu Corazón

Bailamos

Bésame Mucho

 

DISCOGRAPHY

Grace (2016) - indie pop/jazz/rock

Elkin and Alarke (2016) - tropical electronic dance music

The Lark (2013) - indie pop/jazz

The Bailsmen (2013) - Gypsy jazz, featured vocalist

Midas (2012) - indie jazz

 

SELECT MUSIC VIDEOS

Just You

Angel

 

 

THE ALBUM

 

Little Secret will be my fifth studio album. I am very fortunate to be working with an incredible team of inspiring and talented musicians to help make these albums: producer and composer Justin Mathews (who produced my most recent EP, Grace), Alex Dadras (platinum producer for A$AP Rocky), Sean Naughton AKA Spiderhound (producer and A&R with record label Producer Dojo), AJ Ramirez (playback engineer with Electronic Creatives and music producer), Greg Somerville (playback engineer with Electronic Creatives and music producer), and Jay Wires (vintage synth specialist at Tone Tweakers and producer and engineer at The Synth Sanctuary).

 

Little Secret will be an electronic pop album with catchy hooks, experimental electronics, dance beats, jazz chords, dark electronic sounds and rhythm changes that keep you on your toes, rich soundscapes, vocal effects and manipulation, and poetic lyrics. The final recording has not yet been completed. That's where you come in. 

 

 

BUDGET & GOALS

Until now, I've been paying out-of-pocket for the making of Little Secret, as well as Cuba Diaries, another project that I'll mention below.

These expenses include hiring musicians and engineers and paying for studio costs and promotional services. This is costly, which is why I need your help to fund this album.  

Your contributions will go toward the following:

 

STRETCH GOAL: CUBA DIARIES

Two years ago, I created a month-long solo artist retreat in Havana, Cuba and wrote and recorded a Cuban jazz album with a 6-piece band. 

This music has already been recorded, but it needs finishing touches. If we reach the goal to fund the making of Little Secret, additional funds will pay for the mixing, mastering, distribution, and promotion of Cuba Diaries.

It's a four-song EP that features a six-piece Cuban jazz band. It features Havana's leading musicians playing infectious melodies and Afro-Cuban rhythms on Cuban jazz piano, percussion, bass, and the traditional Cuban tres guitar.

WATCH THE CUBA DIARIES TRAILER AT THE TOP OF THIS CAMPAIGN!

 

WHY SHOULD YOU CONTRIBUTE?

 

PERKS

If you contribute to this campaign, you will get access to exclusive content and very cool perks, listed on this page.

I've got all kinds of fun stuff for you: a digital dance party, autographed CDs, access to unreleased demo tracks, songwriting journals, jewelry, tee shirts, songs written just for you, music lessons, private concerts, and more. You can even become a co-executive producer and be credited on the CD!

Your support is what makes this project possible, and I’m so grateful for it.

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Please help spread the word about my campaign.

Use the Indiegogo share tools! 

1. Become a partner

The obvious way you can help is to choose one of the perks offered as part of this campaign.

2. Share my campaign

If it's not financially possible to contribute towards my campaign, I understand. That being said, there are some things you can still do that would make a huge difference that don't cost anything.

It would be AMAZING if you could share my video or campaign through social media or email to your friends and family... you never know who's going to want to help turn this dream into reality.

3. Feature my campaign

If you have a music blog or podcast, interview me! Just email management@alarke.com.

 

WE CAN DO THIS TOGETHER! As soon as you support this Indiegogo campaign, PLEASE TELL EVERYONE YOU'VE DONE IT, AND SHARE THE LINK.

 

Thank you, thank you, thank you.

LOVE,

Mary Alouette

AKA

Alarke

 

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

I have successfully run three other crowdfunding campaigns - two for the production of other albums included in my discography above and one to help fund my volunteer work with refugees in Greece. Previous backers know that I take these campaigns very seriously and that I deliver what I promise. I will be relying on others to help produce this music, and I can't predict potential delays.

If I do not get enough funding, these albums will still eventually come out, as I'm dedicated to these projects. It'll just take a lot longer if I have to continue to fund this project on my own. Please help me finish this sooner than later so you can enjoy this music sooner!

story:
Prayer Journal

Prayer Journal is a collection of heartfelt, intimate worship songs that welcome you into God's presence. We're creating a record that captures the feels of worship, the warmth of worship. Using a recording technique that combines analog recording with the versatility of digital components, we will deliver a new sound for these new songs as an offering to God done with intention and detail.

 

To achieve this recording feat, we need your help. The money you give will help equip our studio to capture this warmth we're after. Instead of sending the investment to professional studio time, we will be equipping our home studio allowing us to make this album, as well as future unwritten albums. We're excited to also help other artists bring their projects to fruition.  

 

The funds not only support the recording equipment but they also help us fairly compensate musicians who are working on the project. Ludwig Näsvall will be recording drums remotely in Sweden! He's an incredibly talented drummer with access to a great studio and he has a huge heart for worship and for God.

PERKS

We're excited to offer some perks that come with your donations to the indiegogo campaign. We'll be offering a digital download of the album, a hard copy of the album with digital download, a private zoom concert, a lyric zine, and also a bundle with all of the perks in one package. The perks won't be available until the completion of the recordings by January 1,  2021, so stay tuned!

About Timmy

I remember having experiences with the presence of God at a very young age while worshipping at Vineyard Anaheim in California. These experiences inspired me to begin playing guitar at age 7 and over the years I've continued to develop my craft from classical composition in college to coproducing my debut record Fall Risk with Sam Winsor. I've always valued the sound achieved in analog recording which led me to choose to work outside of computers as much as possible. For this project, we're combining the things we love about tape with the versatility of digital technology, it's allowing us to have people like Ludwig Näsvall record halfway across the world, making this a world wide worship session.

 

Thank you so much for your support of this project, I'm so excited to produce this record and share the music I've been developing for years.

story:
About This Campaign...

Hey ya’ll! 

Nalani Rothrock and Joshua Lamkin here... and we are making an album! YAY! Our very first full length album! All original music! Right here in Nashville! With Grammy award winner Kevin McKendree at his Rock House Studio! And we want YOU to be a part of it!

This fundraiser is by invite only, so if you are reading this now, we think you are pretty amazing, and we would love to have you join the family. 

As we all know, the pandemic has put a lot of strain on everyone - mentally, physically, financially - you name it, we’ve all felt it. Being a musician during this time has definitely had its challenges. But our hearts are set on completing this collection of songs and the only way we are going to be able to do that is by forming a dream team family with YOU and together we can launch this album out into the world and into your hearts. 

Of course, for your donation, we want to give you cool things in return! Things like signed albums, free merch, handwritten lyrics, album credit, an exclusive live studio performance meet and greet, and a private house concert,  just to name a few! It’s all up to you and how involved you would like to be and which perk you choose. We are independent artists trying to release music during a pandemic, and with your help, you can make our dream a reality! 

So if you have the means and you believe in us, we would LOVE to have you be a part of our dream team family. Your contribution will be directly helping us properly record and release these songs that we have poured our heart and soul into. 

THANK YOU FOR READING AND WATCHING AND FOR YOUR CONSIDERATION!

What We Need & What You Get...

We need to raise $30K to make this album happen! Here is a breakdown of what your contribution with help us do: 

$11,000 - studio recording/production/mixing/mastering costs
$5,000 - photoshoots/videoshoots/album artwork
$3,000 - hiring a publicist (3 months of marketing, publicity, press, promotion, etc)
$3,000 - 3 months of radio promotion
$2,000 - merch (stickers, t-shirts, etc)
$1,500 - printing of albums
$1,000 - social media advertising/promotion
$1,000 - mailing costs
TOTAL ALBUM COST: $27,500
*2,500 goes to covering the fees associated with hosting this fundraiser on Indiegogo*

And here are the cool things we want to give you in return, depending on the perk you select:

HIGH FIVE ($25):
Digital download of the album!

BIG HUG ($50):
Everything in previous perk plus...
Signed copy of the album!

SOME LOVIN' (100):
Everything in previous perks plus...
Signed Poster!
Ticket to virtual album release show!

ALL THE LOVIN' ($250):
Everything in previous perks plus...
An extra signed copy of the album!
Copy of handwritten lyrics of your song choice!
​Social media shoutout!

OH MY GOSH ($500):
Everything in previous perks plus...
Three extra signed copies of the album!
Merch item of your choice!

YOU LIGHT UP MY LIFE ($1,000):
Everything in previous perks plus...
Album credit! (Your name will be listed on the album!)
You pick mp3 cover song!
Ticket to an exclusive private live in-studio performance plus meet and greet! 

YOU ARE MY SHINING STAR ($2,500):
Everything in previous perks plus...
Private house concert! You provide the space, and we will come play for you!

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER HERO! ($5,000)
Everything in previous perks plus...
Executive Producer Credit on the album! (with a Grammy Award winning producer)!

The Impact...

With your contribution, you are giving us the power to record, release, and market our music correctly in today's world as an independent artist. Since moving to Nashville two years ago, we have learned so much from music city, and putting all of that knowledge into action takes way more money than we have.

Other Ways You Can Help...

Our goal is to spread love with the power of music! Even if you can't contribute, you can still help!

If you know of anyone that would dig what we do and be interested in donating to this album to help us reach our goal, please feel free to share this campaign with them privately. All we ask is you do not share on social media as of now, as we are trying to keep this in the family!

And you can always continue to engage with us via social media with comments, likes and shares of our music and videos, as well as streaming our music on your favorite listening platforms like Spotify, iTune, and Amazon Music. 

THANK YOU...

Thank you for taking the time to read our story. We are so excited to get to work. If you would like to donate, please check out the different available perks ($25 - $5000) and have a rocking day!
story_txt:
About This Campaign...
Hey ya’ll! 
Nalani Rothrock and Joshua Lamkin here... and we are making an album! YAY! Our very first full length album! All original music! Right here in Nashville! With Grammy award winner Kevin McKendree at his Rock House Studio! And we want YOU to be a part of it!
This fundraiser is by invite only, so if you are reading this now, we think you are pretty amazing, and we would love to have you join the family. 
As we all know, the pandemic has put a lot of strain on everyone - mentally, physically, financially - you name it, we’ve all felt it. Being a musician during this time has definitely had its challenges. But our hearts are set on completing this collection of songs and the only way we are going to be able to do that is by forming a dream team family with YOU and together we can launch this album out into the world and into your hearts. 
Of course, for your donation, we want to give you cool things in return! Things like signed albums, free merch, handwritten lyrics, album credit, an exclusive live studio performance meet and greet, and a private house concert,  just to name a few! It’s all up to you and how involved you would like to be and which perk you choose. We are independent artists trying to release music during a pandemic, and with your help, you can make our dream a reality! 
So if you have the means and you believe in us, we would LOVE to have you be a part of our dream team family. Your contribution will be directly helping us properly record and release these songs that we have poured our heart and soul into. 
THANK YOU FOR READING AND WATCHING AND FOR YOUR CONSIDERATION!

What We Need & What You Get...
We need to raise $30K to make this album happen! Here is a breakdown of what your contribution with help us do: 
$11,000 - studio recording/production/mixing/mastering costs$5,000 - photoshoots/videoshoots/album artwork$3,000 - hiring a publicist (3 months of marketing, publicity, press, promotion, etc)$3,000 - 3 months of radio promotion$2,000 - merch (stickers, t-shirts, etc)$1,500 - printing of albums$1,000 - social media advertising/promotion$1,000 - mailing costsTOTAL ALBUM COST: $27,500*2,500 goes to covering the fees associated with hosting this fundraiser on Indiegogo*
And here are the cool things we want to give you in return, depending on the perk you select:
HIGH FIVE ($25):Digital download of the album!
BIG HUG ($50):Everything in previous perk plus...Signed copy of the album!
SOME LOVIN' (100):Everything in previous perks plus...Signed Poster!Ticket to virtual album release show!
ALL THE LOVIN' ($250):Everything in previous perks plus...An extra signed copy of the album!Copy of handwritten lyrics of your song choice!​Social media shoutout!OH MY GOSH ($500):Everything in previous perks plus...Three extra signed copies of the album!Merch item of your choice!YOU LIGHT UP MY LIFE ($1,000):Everything in previous perks plus...Album credit! (Your name will be listed on the album!)You pick mp3 cover song!Ticket to an exclusive private live in-studio performance plus meet and greet! 
YOU ARE MY SHINING STAR ($2,500):Everything in previous perks plus...Private house concert! You provide the space, and we will come play for you!
EXECUTIVE PRODUCER HERO! ($5,000)Everything in previous perks plus...Executive Producer Credit on the album! (with a Grammy Award winning producer)!

The Impact...
With your contribution, you are giving us the power to record, release, and market our music correctly in today's world as an independent artist. Since moving to Nashville two years ago, we have learned so much from music city, and putting all of that knowledge into action takes way more money than we have.

Other Ways You Can Help...
Our goal is to spread love with the power of music! Even if you can't contribute, you can still help!
If you know of anyone that would dig what we do and be interested in donating to this album to help us reach our goal, please feel free to share this campaign with them privately. All we ask is you do not share on social media as of now, as we are trying to keep this in the family!
And you can always continue to engage with us via social media with comments, likes and shares of our music and videos, as well as streaming our music on your favorite listening platforms like Spotify, iTune, and Amazon Music. 
THANK YOU...
Thank you for taking the time to read our story. We are so excited to get to work. If you would like to donate, please check out the different available perks ($25 - $5000) and have a rocking day!

story:
The 2nd Album Cometh...

We did Bonfire Music back in 2013. I promised another album would follow swiftly, and here we are, 8 years later!

Thing is, friends, I didn't have much to say. You can't write songs about meaningless shit ad infinitum, ad nauseum. (#justinbiebercan).

But over the past few years, that's changed. I suddenly find I have 12 songs ready to go.

They are songs about being a parent, and being a child; about the universe and creation and God's holy plan; about being rescued from hell by a redeeming presence.

They are good songs, friends, I assure you. When put together in the right order they sound nice.

 

It's more than physical what I need

That's not true, friends - it isn't. Something physical is exactly what I need. I need some cash. Your cash, actually.

I've been round my mate Jake's house to get a bunch of these songs recorded. Truth be told, they're pretty much all done already. That's why I can say they are good songs, and sound nice when put in the right order.

But now we need to mix and master them properly.

We started recording back in September 2019, if you can believe that. I would like to get the thing finished pronto, prontissimo, prontaprint. 

That's where you come in, compadre. I've spent around £1000 so far. Now I'd like to raise another £1000. That'll go to old Jakey for the mixing and mastering, and to Mike Wilton for a touch more instrument playing. 

I must warn you, friends, I will probably use some of the money to buy myself some KFC too. Nothing can stop that.

 

What's in it for me?

And by "me" I mean "you".

Well, signed CD's, lyric sheets, and house gigs. Those first two kinda suck, and no-one wants a stranger to come round their house and play songs.

But that's what I'm offering, friends. It's an offer you can't refuse.

The signed CD's will look nice. The lyric sheets will look nice. The house gigs will make you feel nice.

I can't promise you that I won't put the album on Spotify. I will. So you'll be able to listen to it, practically for free. I'll do that regardless. If no one buys any crappy CDs or lyric sheets, I'll pay for the thing myself. 

What I'm offering you here is a chance to feel like you're close to a star. The CD's will actually be signed by me. The lyric sheets will actually be made by me - my very own fingers, friends! Just think about that.

I can't promise it will be me who actually turns up to house gigs. I will most likely have a stunt double for those.

 

Risks & Challenges

There are none, friends. None!

 

Trust & Transparency

Full trust. Full transparency. That's what I offer.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You already give to charity, you say? Signed up to something just the other week eh?

Well, we've got a problem then, don't we. 

There's no other way you can help. 

I thought we were friends?

story:
Hi, I’m a jazz doublebassist and composer and my name’s Eva Kess. Born in Berlin, I grew up in Porto Alegre and Bern. My passion is music and it became my profession.

At the music academy of the city of Basel I recieved quiet a lot of musical input as well as in the Bird’s Eye Jazz Club which I frequented regularly during my time in Basel.

I’m feeling very happy and grateful for being able to present my new album „Flying Curly“ which we could record in Co-Production with the Swiss Culture Radio SRF. Only 4 bands a year get the opportunity to record for SRF and I'm truly thankful for that opportunity! The CD is going to be released on February 24th 2017 on the label UNIT Records.

Our soundengineer was Andy Neresheimer and Peter Bürli from SRF made it possible that the production took place (both based in Zürich).

The pictures on the CD were shot by Berlin based photographer George Ambrose Baake and the cover was designed by Bern based graphic artist Benjamin Scheurer.

All the music on the album was written by me, brought to life by my beautiful, lively and wonderful co-musicians.

The Eva Kess Group is a quiet international band. Our guitarist Filipe Duarte is from Lisbon, Portugal. I met him in Manhattan and he recently moved to Berlin, Germany. Gregor Ftičar is an excellent pianist from Slovenia, was a student in Graz, Austria, and we met at the Generations Jazzfestival in Frauenfeld, Switzerland. Our drummer Peter Kronreif is Austrian and lives in Brooklyn.

Would you like to listen how we sound? Then feel free to click on the following link. That’s my homepage and on the start page you'll find the teaser that I produced together with my Zürich based friend and videowoman Palma Fiacco on a icecold day beginning of January 2017 above the rooftops in the old town of Bern, Switzerland. It was fun! www.evakess.com

story:
You are helping to not only get our Artist albums into your hands but you also are helping to get them on streaming services such as iTunes and Spotify. You are the people and we are the peoples label. Be apart of the story and get your awesome !batDOG! Merch!

Pick a perk & share with yer fiends.
<3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 

here are our some of our artist options for albums!

Over Yonder is a 4 piece soundscape of rock nnn roll drenched in psychedelia and rolled through out the muddy streets of your mind, this 4 track album is sure to be on your constant rotation.

The only and only gunnn slinger himself Mr. Doc Gunnn & his sophmore e.p. Cursive Cool is a dimension hopping transcedental medition into the trailing whispers of your subconscious. 

Everybody Loves Cornbread, and his album "Only on the Weekends" is gunna make you love it even more, rooted mainly in American roots rhythm n blues this 6 track e.p. will make you, laugh, cry and dance.

Do you even dance? If you've listened to Broth and their debut album 'Love & Drugs or Drugs & Drugs' than chances are you couldn't help but to.  This four track e.p. is riddled with catchy melodies and chill summer vibes.

Our favorite Sumbats from Mars, The Mother Vines are a razor blades edge of pure raw emotion and punky surf riffs. 'Hollywood Monster' is their Junior E.P. filled with fast paced punk surf blast beats and energy that'll make your hair stand on end.

Our pride and joy here, 13 bands from all across the states and one from Down Under! 
20 songs, pure unadulterated raw organic 100% USDA choice DIY Rock N Roll.
You need this album in your collection and on rotation. Real Rock NNN Roll.

Stranger Than Fact is by far one of the most rad DIY bands we know, from touring, to hosting to rocking the crowd this band gives you their all, all the time; evertime! Period. Psychedelic to say the least, you can't help but to want to party down on the dance floor when their grooves hit. Here we have a full length L.P. filled with hidden passages into Rock NNN Roll fantasy.

 

Also Available:

THE MOTHER VINES- FOLLOWING ME- LOVE CULT

DOC GUNNN - CREEP NNN LURK

OKIE BOURGEOUS - FREEDA BE SAYINDO

Sink yer fangs!!!

check out more at www.batDOG.ROCKS

story:
Quiénes somos

Frozen Dawn somos una banda madrileña de black metal con más de 10 años de experiencia a nuestras espaldas. Tenemos dos discos actualmente editados, "The Old Prophecy Of Winterland" y "Those of the Cursed Light" y hemos compartido escenario con bandas de la talla de Watain, Necrophobic, Belphegor o Primordial entre muchos otros.

Queremos lanzar nuestro nuevo trabajo discográfico para el verano de 2017, y para ello necesitamos vuestra ayuda. Será un álbum diferente ya que contendrá versiones de las bandas de black metal que de alguna manera influencian el sonido de Frozen Dawn. Además queremos con este álbum rendirle a todas esas bandas nuestro pequeño homenaje.

Si queréis conocer un poco la música que hacemos podéis disfrutar de nuestro video-clip del tema "Banished, The everlasting Confinement" perteneciente a nuestro último album "Those of the Cursed Light".

 

A qué destinaremos vuestras aportaciones

Las aportaciones que realicéis se usarán para financiar los costes de producción del disco (grabación, mezcla y master), el cual ya ha sido grabado, la producción de las recompensas (digipack, camisetas, parches) así com el diseño del arte del disco que ha sido llevado a cabo por Gragoth de los Estudios Luciferium War Graphics.

El objetivo de 2000€ que queremos conseguir no hará posible pagar todo lo mencionado arriba, pero significará una excelente e indispensable ayuda que podréis proporcionarnos.

Aquí tenéis en detalle algunos de los productos incluidos en las recompensas:

Las camisetas estarán disponibles en las tallas, s, m, l, xl, girlie xs, s, m, l y tank xs, s, m, l.

 

Hitos desbloqueables

Hemos preparado unas pequeñas sorpresas que iremos desvelando según se vayan cumpliendo los diversos objetivos que nos hemos propuesto.

  • 250€ !!!! - Revelaremos los títulos y bandas de los cinco primeros temas del álbum.
  • 350€ !!!! - Revelaremos la portada del álbum.
  • 500€ !!!!! - Revelaremos los títulos y bandas del resto de los temas del álbum.
  • 1000€ !!!!! - Video de agradecimiento para todos los mecenas.
  • 2000€ !!!!! - Objetivo conseguido. Videoclip de uno de los temas del album.

Además durante todo el tiempo que dure la campaña estaremos realizando promociones y sorteos relacionados con el nuevo álbum !!!

 

Recompensas:

PACK HELLHAMMER (5€)

Incluye:

Descarga digital Anticipada del álbum "Unearthing the Black Arts".

PACK IMMORTAL (12€)
&
PACK IMMORTAL SIGNATURE (15€)

Incluye:

Descarga digital Anticipada del álbum "Unearthing the Black Arts".
Digipack "Unearthing The Black Arts" Edicion limitada.
Parche "Frozen Dawn Logo".
El pack signature viene con el álbum "Unearthing The Black Arts"  firmado por la banda.

PACK ENSLAVED (12€)

Incluye:

Descarga digital Anticipada del álbum "Unearthing the Black Arts".
T-shirt "EYE" design color negro, verde militar o gris.
Parche "Frozen Dawn Logo".

PACK BATHORY (24€)
&
PACK BATHORY SIGNATURE (27€)

Incluye:

Descarga digital Anticipada del álbum "Unearthing the Black Arts".
Digipack "Unearthing The Black Arts" Edicion limitada.
T-shirt "EYE" design color negro, verde militar o gris.
Parche "Frozen Dawn Logo".
El pack signature viene con el álbum "Unearthing The Black Arts"  firmado por la banda.

PACK MAYHEM (27€)
&
PACK MAYHEM SIGNATURE (30€)

Incluye:

Descarga digital Anticipada del álbum "Unearthing the Black Arts".
Digipack "Unearthing The Black Arts" Edicion limitada.
CD "Those of the Cursed Light", segundo álbum de Frozen Dawn.
CD "The Old Prophecy Of Winterland", primer álbum de Frozen Dawn.
Parche "Frozen Dawn Logo".
El pack signature viene con los tres discos firmados por la banda.

PACK FROZEN DAWN (37€)
&
PACK FROZEN DAWN SIGNATURE (40€)

Incluye:

Descarga digital Anticipada del álbum "Unearthing the Black Arts".
Digipack "Unearthing The Black Arts" Edicion limitada.
CD "Those of the Cursed Light", segundo álbum de Frozen Dawn.
CD "The Old Prophecy Of Winterland", primer álbum de Frozen Dawn.
T-shirt "EYE" design color negro.
Parche "Frozen Dawn Logo".
El pack signature viene con los tres discos firmados por la banda.

IMPORTANTE: el precio de las recompensas no incluye los gastos de envío. Estos gastos serán añadidos a la hora de formalizar el pedido.

+ Info

Página oficial de la banda: http://www.frozendawn.com

Bandcamp: http://frozendawn.bandcamp.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/truefrozendawn

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Bob Conover. Im 29, a father, husband, and I work a fulltime job. I'm the co-owner and founder of Savage Custom Picks. I started playing guitar when I was 14, and I have been in love with music all my life. Throughout my years of playing guitar I have tried MANY different kinds of picks and there were always things I liked or didn't like about certain picks. I found ones I liked but they were never perfect. After discovering boutique picks it occurred to me that I could learn how to make my own. So for months I worked at making picks out of acrylic. After alot of hard work I finally developed my own style of making picks and discovered that people were interested in purchasing the picks I was making. After many, many sales and new friendships, Savage Custom Picks has become what it is. We are rapidly gaining a fanbase and its the most incredible feeling to create something that people love.

Even though I am able to make any kind of pick, I am not able to do certain things. Mostly, people want certain customization and huge amounts of picks. This campaign is geared towards raising funds in order to purchase certain equipment in order to fulfill requests that we are currently not able to fulfill.

Savage Custom Picks is my baby. Even though I work a full time job during the day, at night, I am in my shop creating super awesome guitar picks. Because of the jump in production this new equipment would provide, my partner Daryl Altizer and I, will be one step closer to making Savage our fulltime job. It is our dream to do nothing but provide the best boutique picks on the market and wake up everyday knowing that we will be doing what we love and making people happy.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are attempting to raise $5000. This money will be used specifically for the following reasons.

  • Lazer Etcher- This is by far the most important purchase that will be made. This will be used for custom engraving on acrylic picks and band logos on normal picks that will never fade unlike regular printing that is applied to most picks.
  • Shop Equipment- We will be purchasing various shop tools such as a planer, new sanders and saws, and other various hand tools we use on a daily basis.
  • Unique Materials- There are many different materials we want to make picks from. Some of them being a little higher end. These funds will allow us to purchase these materials, allowing us to make unique picks that no-one else is offering.
  • Merchandise- Lastly, these funds will allow us to offer more options in our merch store. There will be unique items such as lazer cut, led lit savage signs. Another example would be custom necklaces and keychains which we constantly get requests for.sss

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you may not be able to contribute financially and that is totally understandable. One way you can still help is to just share this campaign everywhere you can. We are trying to change the way people think about picks and you sharing this campaign is incredibly valuable.

story:
Gaitas'18

 Esta actividad, se basa en una competencia intercolegial de los grupos gaiteros, que  a lo largo de la epoca navideña se presentan en varios festivales y son juzgados por personas conocedoras de la musica. Los colegios participantes se preparan con mucha antelación para asi poder representar de la mejor manera a su colegio.

 Para poder pertenecer a esta agrupación musical, necesitaré una cantidad de 400 dolares, los cuales incluyen: las mensualidades, profesores, traje, instrumentos, escenografia entre otras cosas.

Este seria mi ultima oportunidad de formar parte de gaitas antes de graduarme, es una experiencia increíble que te da la posibilidad de desenvolverte mejor en grupo, y si tocas un instrumento como yo,te da las herramienta,mejorar tu tecnica y así tocar muy bien.

story:
Mortal Lessons is an hour-long work of music theater based on a book of the same name by Richard Selzer. A former Yale surgeon, Selzer's writing combines his intimate knowledge of the human body with a love for baroque language and flights of fancy that are by turns grotesque and sublime. My piece toes a similar line between the sacred and profane, the grotesque and sublime—life, death, love and all the rest.

The work will receive its full-length premiere on February 25, 2018, at the San Francisco Conservatory of Music as the headlining work on the Hot Air Music Festival. 

Your tax-deductible contribution will help make this work come to life. This production is truly a team effort, and, by contributing any amount, YOU are becoming part of our team as well. 

I can't do this work without them and WE can't do it without YOU. 


Click here for more information and media.

story:
Our Story:

The Unfortunates are a high energy rock band from Edmonton, Alberta. Founded by vocalist/guitarist Tanner Gordon and bassist Tim Plamondon, the duo instantly formed a tight musical chemistry that evolved beyond folk roots. Drummer Brendan McGonigle was added to create the original inception of the band.

In 2010 the band released their first collective effort "Calm down this is only the end". The album featured the singles "Losing you" and "Calm down", and was well received by the public. 19 months later, the band released their acclaimed record "We talked of shadows", and received "Band of the month" honours from local radio station Sonic 102.9. This album produced the hit song "Hurt no more", which was given regular radio play for the following year, as well as thousands of views on YouTube. 

2014 brought a new album, Indie Films, a new member, guitarist Nathan Stamhuis, and a name change to the group, who would henceforth be known solely as "The Unfortunates".  Indie films was received as a worthy follow up to the previous 2011 album, producing the single "Talk show host" and the hit "Brick by brick". The band also embarked on an ambitious cross Canada tour, performing 12 shows in 14 days across 9 urban centres. 

The band immediately began writing for another album, while in the meantime adding another guitarist in Leo Contessa. Shortly after this addition the band played it's 200th show and continued to develop into one of the premier live bands in Alberta.The bands latest self titled release is scheduled for June 22, 2018. 

-The Unfortunates are a high energy, alternative rock band from Edmonton, Alberta. Combining loud guitars, rugged lyrics, and strong vocal support, The Unfortunates pack a punch with their accessible and original sound.

  • Every pre order goes directly towards our album and tour launch! To thank the fans for their continued support, we have created special limited edition merch for this launch. Every pre order will also be personalized by every member of the band! Without the continued support of the fans this launch would not be possible. 

What We Need & What You Get:

  • Our Goal is to achieve a minimum of $1000 in pre orders to help produce the albums and our supporting tour.
  • There is a limited number of unique, signed and limited merch packages availble.

Your Impact:

Every order makes it possible for us to make albums, to tour the songs and to get it into the hands of the fans who are there for us every step of the way, new and old. 

Risks & Challenges:

Before a single dollar is recuperated, a band must create, write, record and produce an album. This record took us four years to get it to the finish line. We challenged ourselves musically, mentally and financially to make this our best record to date. 

Other Ways You Can Help:

If you are unable to contribute to our pre order you can still help in easy ways! Please share and like our posts on facebook, youtube, twitter and instagram. YOU can make the biggest impact in getting the word out and we appreciate every like and share along the way.
